text: Ndithudi Mulungu adzakwaniritsa masomphenya a Mtumwi wake. Ndithudi inu mudzalowa mu Mzikiti Wolemekezeka, ngati Mulungu afuna mopanda vuto ndipo ena adzameta mitu yawo ndiponso ena adzapungula tsitsi lawo ndipo mudzakhala opanda mantha. Iye adadziwa zimene inu simudadziwe ndipo adapereka moonjezera pa zimenezi, kupambana kwa msanga
